text: Cajal: * Santiago Ramón y Cajal, Spanish histologist, physician, pathologist * Fortún Garcés Cajal, medieval Spanish nobleman * Nicolae Cajal (1919–2004), Romanian Jewish physician, academic, politician, philanthropist * Cajal Institute, a neuroscience research center in Madrid, Spain. * Cajal cells ** Cajal–Retzius cell ** Interstitial cell of Cajal (ICC) * Cajal bodies (CBs) * Cajal (crater), a tiny lunar impact crater
title: Cajal
